dependabot update -f input.yml --local . --updater-image ghcr.io/dependabot/dependabot-updater-silent
stdout -count=2 create_pull_request
pr-created expected-1.json
pr-created expected-2.json

-- manifest.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "dependency-b": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "exclude-me": { "version": "1.2.3" }
}

-- expected-1.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.5" },
  "dependency-b": { "version": "1.2.5" },
  "exclude-me": { "version": "1.2.3" }
}

-- expected-2.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "dependency-b": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "exclude-me": { "version": "1.2.5" }
}

-- dependency-a --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.2.3",
    "1.2.4",
    "1.2.5"
  ]
}

-- dependency-b --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.2.3",
    "1.2.4",
    "1.2.5"
  ]
}

-- exclude-me --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.2.3",
    "1.2.4",
    "1.2.5"
  ]
}

-- input.yml --
job:
  package-manager: "silent"
  source:
    directory: "/"
    provider: example
    hostname: example.com
    api-endpoint: https://example.com/api/v3
    repo: dependabot/smoke-tests
  dependency-groups:
    - name: exclude
      rules:
        exclude-patterns:
          - "exclude-me"
